EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Fate Singer's Repertoire
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain the Magical Training feat. Each core of this tree grants +25 Spell Points, +5 Positive and Sonic Spell Power, +5 Universal Spell Power, +5 Melee Power, +4 Ranged Power. Each core also grants a +1 Epic Bonus to all spell DCs

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Intoxicating Presence
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Enemies that strike you have a 5% chance of becoming Fascinated for 12 seconds, with no saving throw.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Glitter of Fame
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to all ability scores and saves

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Hear my Voice Friend
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Greatest Shout, Great Shout, Shout, and Echoes of Discord spells now target allies inside their areas of effect and heal them for 20% of the damage potential of the spell.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Music of the Spider Queen
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +[3/6/10] Universal Spell Power. Rank 3: If you have Fascinate it now gains the power to mesmerize Vermin and if you have Bardic Inspiration it now applies Neutralize Poison. Mesmerized Vermin are not susceptible to suggestion.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Jack of all trades
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] bonus to all Skills. Rank 3: If you have the Inspire Bardic Ability it now also grants +3 Skills to those you inspire.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Epic Strike
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose an Epic Strike

EnhancementSelection.Name: Strike a Chord
EnhancementSelection.Description: Blasts a single target with a random note of music for 1d6+1 Sonic damage per character level scaling with Spell Power. You gain a stack of Chords of Fate which 30 seconds, stacks 3 times. Cost: 2 Spell Points, Cooldown: 2 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: The Sword Sings
EnhancementSelection.Description: Melee Attack: 3[W] +2 Critical Threat Range, Your weapon swings with the power of song, causing an additional 2d10 Sonic damage per character level that scales 200% with Melee Power. You gain a stack of Chords of Fate which lasts 30 seconds, stacks 3 times. Critical hits cause the target to be Stunned for 2 seconds, no save. Cooldown: 4 seconds

EnhancementSelection.Name: The Pluck of a String
EnhancementSelection.Description: Ranged Attack: 3[W] +2 Critical Threat Range. Your ranged weapon sings through the air causing 2d10 Sonic Damage per character level that scales with 200% Ranged power. You gain a stack of Chords of Fate which lasts 30 seconds, stacks 3 times. Critical Hits cause the target to be stunned for 2 seconds, no save. Cooldown: 5 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Harmonic Resonance
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Epic Strikes in this tree and all of your attacks and offensive spells have a 20% chance to build up a stacking Harmonic Resonance in your enemies. Harmonic Resonance: Each stack increases the creature's vulnerability to Sonic damage by 10% and reduces their Armor Class by 5. The effect may stack up to 3 times and lasts up to 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Tune of the Weave
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain [2/4/6] Magical Resistance Rating and [10/30/50] Spell Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: The Rhythm to Reign
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You generate [15/25/35]% less threat from all sources. In addition, you gain +[5/10/15] Positive Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Mantle of Sound and Fury
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Fate Singer Destiny Mantle: All your attacks and spells have a chance to cause a swirl of music notes to surround you causing 1d6 Sonic damage per level to all nearby foes. Scales with the highest of Sonic Spell Power or 200% Melee Power or Ranged Power. This will not damage Fascinated targets. When this occurs you gain 6 per character level temporary Hit Points for 10 seconds. Can only occur once every 10 seconds.

Stance.Name: Mantle of Sound and Fury
Stance.Description: Fate Singer Destiny Mantle: All your attacks and spells have a chance to cause a swirl of music notes to surround you causing 1d6 Sonic damage per level to all nearby foes. Scales with the highest of Sonic Spell Power or 200% Melee Power or Ranged Power. This will not damage Fascinated targets. When this occurs you gain 6 per character level temporary Hit Points for 10 seconds. Can only occur once every 10 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Discord
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Manifest Discord against your enemies

EnhancementSelection.Name: Echoes of Discord
EnhancementSelection.Description: Spell: Consumes all Chords of Fate. Creates a blast of music on the target that strikes nearby enemies for 1d6+1 Sonic damage per Character Level, scales with 100% with Sonic Spell Power. Each Chords of Fate you have increases the damage by 100%. This attempts to stun the target for 1 second per Chords of Fate. Fortitude Save of DC:20 + STR/DEX/INT/CHA + Evocation Bonuses. Releasing 3 Chords of Fate restores 10 Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Blade of Discord
EnhancementSelection.Description: Melee Cleave Attack: +3[W], +2 to Critical Threat Range. Consumes all Chords of Fate. You cleave your foes with the power of discord. Stuns for 1 second for each Chords of Fate consumed unless they make a Fortitude Save vs (DC 20 + Highest of STR/DEX/INT/CHA Mod + Stunning Bonuses). Releasing 3 Chords of Fate restores 10 Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Arrow of Discord
EnhancementSelection.Description: Ranged Attack: +3[W], +2 Critical Threat Range. Consumes all Chords of Fate. Discord erupts from the first enemy struck, applying a Stun for 1 second per Chords of Fate consumed unless the enemies make a Fortitude Save vs (DC 20 + Highest of DEX/WIS/INT/CHA Mod + Stunning Bonuses). Releasing 3 Chords of Fate Restores 10 Spell Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Grandeur
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your friendly spells now apply a lingering buff that grants +3 Armor Class and Physical Resistance Rating. Stacks twice for 10 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Master the Acoustics
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[5/10/15] Sonic Spell Power. Rank 3: When using the Sonic Blast or Reverberate spells the damage is increased by 50%.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: A Little bit of Music
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Grants Bardic Inspiration if you don't already have it. Passive: +3 Bard Songs and +1 Spell Penetration.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Reign
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Vorpal Strikes cause [7/9/11]d20 Electric and Sonic damage. Scales with Melee and Ranged Power by 300%. Passive: Gain +[1/2/3] to Hit.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: The Magic of Music
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose a spell school to specialize in

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: The Sonata to Serve
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Spell Penetration and [3/6/9]% Fortification Bypass. Rank 3: If you are actively using the Mantle of Sound and Fury you are now immune to Arcane Spell Failure.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Masquerade
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You have a [3/6/10]% reduction in the cost of your spells.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Great Ballads of War
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +[1/2/3] to hit and damage. If you have the Bardic Ballad Feat this also applies to your Ballad's bonus to others.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Majesty
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You are immune to Charisma stat damage. When you play any Bardic Song while using the Mantle of Sound and Fury, you heal yourself and nearby allies for 1d2 Hit Points per Character Level and apply the Restoration spell. Scales with Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Resonance of Fate
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose a Thread of Fate to Resonate with

EnhancementSelection.Name: Arcane Resonance
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 to Intelligence, Wisdom and Charisma. When using the Mantle of Sound and Fury gain +10 Universal Spell Power, +2 Spell Penetration, +4 Use Magic Device, +10% to your Fire, Cold, Acid and Electric Absorption.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Divine Resonance
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 to Strength, Charisma and Wisdom. When using the Mantle of Sound and Fury gain +1 to hit and damage, and to confirm critical hits, +5 Physical Resistance Rating, and +15 Positive and Negative Spell Power.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Martial Resonance
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 to Strength, Dexterity and Constitution. When using the Mantle of Sound and Fury gain +5 Physical and Magical Resistance rating, +5 Armor Class, and +10 Melee and Ranged Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Primal Resonance
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 to Strength, Constitution and Wisdom, +25 Maximum Hit Points, +10 Spell Resistance, +10 Healing Amplification, and an additional +3 Strength while Raging.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Shout it out
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Increase your ability to Shout

EnhancementSelection.Name: Greatest Shout
EnhancementSelection.Description: You may cast the spell Greater Shout as a Spell-like ability with an increased DC. Emits an ear-splitting yell that deals 1d6+3 Sonic damage per caster level (up to caster level 20) and stuns targets in its path. A successful Fortitude save halves the damage and negates the stun, DC:20 + Highest of Stat Mod + Evocation. Cooldown: 6 seconds. Costs 6 Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Very Very Vocal
EnhancementSelection.Description: When you cast Shout, Great Shout or Horn of Thunder the damage is doubled. Your Discord abilities stun for an additional 3 seconds when used with 3 Chords of Fate

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Metamagics Attunement
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose a Metamagic feat which you can use with no cost.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Enlarge
EnhancementSelection.Description: You can use the Enlarge Metamagic feat at no cost.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Eschew
EnhancementSelection.Description: You can use the Eschew Materials Metamagic feat at no cost.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Extend
EnhancementSelection.Description: You can use the Extend Metamagic feat at no cost.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Ballad of the ages
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You benefit from the True Seeing spell and gain +2 to damage with all weapons. If you have Bardic Ballad it adds Inspired Transcendence to that effect. Inspire Transcendence: +1 to all Spell DCs, +1 to the DC of all Tactical Feats, and True Seeing.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Mastering the Strings
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Spell DCs

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Blade Song
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 multiplier on 19-20 critical hits when using any hand held weapon. This excludes punch weapons and animal forms.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Turn the Tide
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Epic Moment The trumpets call the rally! For 20 seconds you and your party gain full attack bonus, +10% to weapon damage, +10% uncapped Dodge, +100 Universal Spell Power and -25% to spell costs. 5 minute cooldown.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Cut the Strings
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Strike a note to reveal the chords of fate so you might cut them. All monsters within a wide radius around you are forced to dance (Will vs DC:20 + Highest Stat Mod + Enchantment) pulled by the strings of fate for 10 seconds. In Addition for 10 seconds your character gains the ability to cut their strings with any weapon strike or spell at a rate of once per second, instantly killing them. Bosses if they fail their save do not dance but will take an additional 100 Sonic damage that scales with Spell Power when attacked by you in melee for the duration of the effect. Cooldown: 60 seconds.
